description: 1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 5.00m.  Reduce back to previous and most recent reduction points (approximately 40cm).  1 x Amelanchier (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 5.00m.  Thin crown density by 20%.  Tip prune back to previous reduction points (approximately 30cm).1 x Robinia (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 6.00m.  Tip prune to reduce (approximately 1.00m) all round.Mature Bay & Damson Trees (applicants ref. G2) - Approximately 6.00m.  Reduce regrowth back to previous reduction points (approximately 1.00m).  Reduce lateral and sub-lateral growth overhanging the lawn by up to approximately 0.50m.1 x Damson (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 6.00m.  Reduce crown by approximately 1.20m.  Thin crown density by 15%.  Remove dead wood.1 x Small Acer (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 3.00m.  Lightly trim by approximately 20cm to tidy.1 x Larger Acer (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 6.00m.  Reduce back to previous most recent reduction points (approximately 0.50m).1 x Prunus (applicants ref. T8) -  Approximately 5.00m:  Tip prune by 0.50m.(Amended description)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
